channel.title: Testscape help please
channel.description:
i have downloaded the testscape source and when i open compile it says please choose an option below etc.. c- compile serv r- run serv e-exit setup
when i click c or r it says you have not downloaded jdk 5.0 or 6.0 go on mod taharoks post on tutorial there isnt a post i dont think? so what should i do? can any one help me please, thanks. :)

the system canot find the path specified.
press any key to continue…[br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2007, 01:52:26 PM[/size][hr]ok ty edit what path? srry[br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2007, 01:53:02 PM[/size][hr]bump
